name: Rooting VR You
description:
All major VR platforms supported

Cheer on people to do their best!
Match the prompts with your hands on the beat of the music.

Credits
Dylan Smit - VR Game Developer (Code, Design, Audio)
Tommy Huynh - Game Designer (Design, Audio, Animation, Choreography)
Showie Gau - 3D Game Artist (3D Models, Textures, VFX,  Animation)

Music
Too Much Pressure - The Selecter

---

(Made in 2 days during GGJ 2023)
